member.name: IPrintDocumentPackageTarget.Cancel
member.returns: If the Cancel method completes successfully, it returns an S_OK. Otherwise it returns the appropriate HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPrintDocumentPackageTarget.GetPackageTarget
member.summary: Retrieves the pointer to the specific document package target, which allows the client to add a document with the given target type. Clients can call this method multiple times but they always have to use the same target ID.
member.param: The target type GUID obtained from .
The identifier of the interface being requested.
The requested document target interface. The returned pointer is a pointer to an interface.
member.returns: If the GetPackageTarget method completes successfully, it returns an S_OK. Otherwise it returns the appropriate HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPrintDocumentPackageTarget.GetPackageTargetTypes
member.param: The number of supported target types.
The array of supported target types. An array of GUIDs.
member.returns: If the GetPackageTargetTypes method completes successfully, it returns an S_OK. Otherwise it returns the appropriate HRESULT error code.
